verbs.description: [ARG1: god] [V: is] [ARG2: on loyola - chicago side] [ARGM-TMP: at least] [ARGM-TMP: right now] the team chaplain has become an icon during march madness especially as her team makes it to the final four maybelle hicks jean loyola jean schmidt final four
